description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Capture the Oong is a space based muliplayer shooter.  The object is to capture the oong and return it to your base.  The evil rongs however don't like invaders in their space and will do anything to destroy you.
description.short: Capture the Oong is a space based muliplayer shooter.  The object is to capture the oong and return it to your base.  The evil rongs however don't like invaders in their space and will do anything to destroy you.
